messages.content: VocalSeparation-ComfyUI is a custom node for ComfyUI that separates vocals from music.
Which repository is VocalSeparation-ComfyUI based on?
VocalSeparation-ComfyUI is based on the ZFTurbo/Music-Source-Separation-Training repository.

To install VocalSeparation-ComfyUI, you need to clone the repository from GitHub into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes directory and then install the required dependencies using pip install -r requirements.txt.
Where can you find the weights for VocalSeparation-ComfyUI?
The weights for VocalSeparation-ComfyUI will be downloaded from GitHub.
What is the purpose of VocalSeparation-ComfyUI?
The purpose of VocalSeparation-ComfyUI is to separate vocals from music using the ComfyUI platform.
Is VocalSeparation-ComfyUI an official node for ComfyUI?
No, VocalSeparation-ComfyUI is a custom node for ComfyUI, not an official one.
Do you need to manually download the weights for VocalSeparation-ComfyUI?
No, the weights for VocalSeparation-ComfyUI will be automatically downloaded from GitHub.
